text: Nieuwoudt () is an Afrikaans surname of topographic origin. It is an altered version of the originally Dutch surname Nieuhout/Nieuwhout with the meaning "new wood" (from Dutch nieuw "new" and hout "wood"). Notable people with this name include: *Gideon Nieuwoudt (1951–2005), former apartheid-era security policeman *Karl Nieuwoudt (born 1988), South African cricketer *Luan Nieuwoudt (born 1995), South African rugby union player *Nicolaas Nieuwoudt (1929–1989), South African military commander *Stephanus Francois Nieuwoudt (born 1996), South African rugby union player *Teunis Nieuwoudt (born 1991), South African rugby union player ==References== Category:Toponymic surnames Category:Afrikaans-language surnames
title: Nieuwoudt
